name: mrbelvedere
description: A Python/Django web app to help Salesforce developers and ISV partners release metadata to end users via OAuth access

DEBUG.description: Determine whether to show Django's debug messages on errors.  Do not set to True on a production site!!!

MPINSTALLER_CLIENT_ID.description: The Client ID of the Salesforce Connected App (see mrbelvedere installation docs for more info)

MPINSTALLER_CLIENT_SECRET.description: The Client Secret of the Salesforce Connected App

MPINSTALLER_CALLBACK_URL.description: The callback url configured for the Connected App, ex: https://your-app-name.herokuapp.com/mpinstaller/oauth/callback

GITHUB_APP_ID.description: The Github Developer App ID used by the Contributor Tool to do Github OAuth2 logins.  Not needed if you are not using the Contributor Tool

GITHUB_API_SECRET.description: The Github Developer App API Secret used by the Contributor Tool to do Github OAuth2 logins.  Not needed if you are not using the Contributor Tool

SITE_LOGO_IMAGE_URL.description: Enter a url to a hosted image file to use as the site logo

SITE_LOGO_LINK_URL.description: Enter a url that the logo image should link to.  This is typically your main website

SITE_LOGO_ALT_TEXT.description: Enter the logo alt text which will be shown in browsers that don't display images.  This is typically your company name
Enter a url to a hosted image file to use as the site logo

GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_CODE.description: Enter a Google Analytics code to get web analytics, ex: U-12345678-1

GOOGLE_ANALYTICS_ORG.description: Enter a Google Analytics organization to get web analytics, ex: yourdomain.com

WEB_CONCURRENCY.description: The number of processes to run.
